titleStmt.title: Observations on the first and second of the canons, commonly ascribed to the holy apostles wherein an account of the primitive constitution and government of churches, is contained : drawn from ancient and acknowledged writings.
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Gilbert Burnet by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
